org.miktim.websocket

Class WsParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miktim.websocket.WsParameters

  • public class WsParameters
extends Object
    WebSocket connection parameters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WsParameters()
      Creates connection parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBacklog()
      Returns maximum number of pending connections on the server socket.

      Returns connection Socket timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • setSubProtocols

        public WsParameters setSubProtocols(String[] subps)
        Sets supported (server) or requested (client) subprotocols.
        Parameters:
        subps - array of subprotocols in preferred order or null.
        Returns:
        this

      • getSubProtocols

        public String[] getSubProtocols()
        Returns supported (server) or requested (client) subprotocols.
        Returns:
        array of subprotocols. Default: null.

      • setHandshakeSoTimeout

        public WsParameters setHandshakeSoTimeout(int millis)
        Sets open/close WebSocket handshake timeout.
        Parameters:
        millis - handshake timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        this

      • getHandshakeSoTimeout

        public int getHandshakeSoTimeout()
        Returns open/close WebSocket handshake timeout.
        Returns:
        timeout. Default: handshakeSoTimeout milliseconds.

      • setConnectionSoTimeout

        public WsParameters setConnectionSoTimeout(int millis,
                                           boolean ping)
        Sets connection Socket timeout and ping enabled.
        Parameters:
        millis - socket timeout in milliseconds.
        ping - true, if ping enabled.
        Returns:
        this

      • getConnectionSoTimeout

        public int getConnectionSoTimeout()
        Returns connection Socket timeout.
        Returns:
        timeout. Default: connectionSoTimeout milliseconds.

      • isPingEnabled

        public boolean isPingEnabled()
        Returns ping enabled.
        Returns:
        true if so. Default: enabled.

      • setPayloadBufferLength

        public WsParameters setPayloadBufferLength(int len)
        Sets the maximum payload length of the outgoing message frames.
        The minimum length is 125 bytes.
        Parameters:
        len - payload length in bytes.
        Returns:
        this

      • getPayloadBufferLength

        public int getPayloadBufferLength()
        Returns maximum payload length of the outgoing message frames.
        Returns:
        payload length in bytes. Default: 32 KiB.

      • setBacklog

        public WsParameters setBacklog(int num)
        Sets maximum number of pending connections on the server socket.
        Parameters:
        num - of pending connections.
        Returns:
        this

      • getBacklog

        public int getBacklog()
        Returns maximum number of pending connections on the server socket.
        Returns:
        number of pending connections. Default: -1 (system depended).

      • setMaxMessageLength

        public WsParameters setMaxMessageLength(int len)
        Sets incoming WebSocket message max length.
        If exceeded, the connection will be terminated with the 1009 (MESSAGE_TOO_BIG) status code
        Parameters:
        len - max length or -1 for "endless" messages.
        Returns:
        this

      • getMaxMessageLength

        public int getMaxMessageLength()
        Returns incoming WebSocket message max length.
        Returns:
        max message length in bytes. Default: 1 MiB.

      • setMaxMessages

        public WsParameters setMaxMessages(int maxMsgs)
        Sets the maximum number of queued incoming messages per connection. Overflow of this value leads to an error and connection closure with status code 1008 (POLICY_VIOLATION)
        Parameters:
        maxMsgs - maximum number of messages (min value is 1)
        Returns:
        this

      • getMaxMessages

        public int getMaxMessages()
        Returns the maximum number of queued incoming messages per connection.
        Returns:
        number of pending messages. Default: maxMessages

      • setSSLParameters

        public WsParameters setSSLParameters(SSLParameters sslParms)
        Sets TLS connection parameters.
        SSLParameters used by server:
        Protocols, CipherSuites, NeedClientAut, WantClientAuth.
        Parameters:
        sslParms - SSL connection parameters.
        Returns:
        this

      • getSSLParameters

        public SSLParameters getSSLParameters()
        Returns TLS connection parameters.
        Returns:
        SSL parameters. Defaults: from the SSLContext.
